story_03_04000/2401_1001_0100_10:
Whew... I haven’t had a heated battle like that
in ages! And your teamwork! That was awesome!
story_03_04000/2401_1001_0200_10: Exactly! You did well to notice, Flannery!
story_03_04000/2401_1001_0300_10: B-Blaine?! How long were you watching us?
story_03_04000/2401_1001_0400_10:
You are indeed a powerful Trainer, Flannery.
But your eagerness as a Gym Leader has given
you tunnel vision!
story_03_04000/2401_1001_0500_10:
What you need right now are friends that you
can trust and depend on!
story_03_04000/2401_1001_0700_10:
That’s right—friends!
So here’s your final challenge, Flannery.
story_03_04000/2401_1001_0800_10:
Join [Name:PlayerNickname ]’s team,
and make your way to the PML!
story_03_04000/2401_1001_1000_10:
Travel with friends, have fun, battle with them,
and try to reflect on the choices you’ve made.
I’m certain you’ll grow a lot as you go!
story_03_04000/2401_1001_1100_10:
We’d be more than glad to have you on our
team, Flannery. What do you say?
story_03_04000/2401_1001_1200_10:
Thanks. I think you’re right, Blaine...
I’ll do it!
story_03_04000/2401_1001_1300_10: That’s what I wanted to hear!
story_03_04000/2401_1001_1400_10:
[Name:PlayerNickname ], let me on your team!
Let’s make it to the PML together!
story_03_04000/2401_0402_1800_10:
I recognize that “hah!”
I’m looking forward to working with you guys!
story_03_04000/2401_1001_1900_10:
Make sure she doesn’t get into too much
trouble, all right, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
I’m off to form my own team for the PML!
story_03_04000/2401_1001_2100_10:
Hehe. I never said it out loud, Flannery, but I’ve
been itching to battle you with these new rules!
story_03_04000/2401_1001_2200_10: My Trainer’s spirit has long been ignited! Hahaha!
story_03_04000/2401_1001_2300_10:
All right, if that’s the game you’re playing,
I want in! The next time we see each other,
I’m not holding anything back!
story_03_04000/2401_1001_2400_10:
Let’s get moving, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
How many badges do you have so far?
story_03_04000/2401_0401_2600_10:
Oh, right. Badges.
This might be a good time to start collecting them.
story_03_04000/2401_0302_2700_10: I don’t think I have any.
story_03_04000/2401_0402_2800_10:
Oh, right. Badges.
This might be a good time to start collecting them.
story_03_04000/2401_1001_2900_10:
We need to collect five badges to officially
compete in the PML.
story_03_04000/2401_1001_3000_10: And each badge is held by a PML Leader.
story_03_04000/2401_1001_3100_10: Do you know who any of these leaders might be?
story_03_04000/2401_1001_3300_10:
A Gym Leader friend of mine from Kanto, Erika,
might’ve said something about being a PML Leader.
story_03_04000/2401_1001_3400_10:
Then we don’t have any time to lose!
Thanks for everything, Blaine! I’m looking forward
to battling you the next time we see each other!
